content.rendered:
This anthology of 365 Gems from the Quran, with brief explanatory notes, enables readers to gain a clear idea of what the Quran says about:

  • The purpose behind the creation of man and the universe
  • Concept and attributes of God in Islam
  • Man’s obligations toward God
  • Man’s obligations toward fellow human beings
  • Man’s social relations
  • Man’s final end (Death and the Afterlife)
  • Gender equality
  • How to co-exist peacefully with others
  • The immense reward for charity, justice and good conduct
